name: Weather Dashboard
description: This is a weather dashboard, where user can search for a city and find its current weather condition, 3-hour interval forecast, and 5-days weather forecast of the city.

name: Code Quiz
description: This repository creates a timed muitiple-choice question quiz that tests user's Javascript knowledge. There are 10 multiple choice questions and user is given 200 seconds to answer them.

name: Project Tracker
description: This is a web application where teams can track their project development progress, issues, etc.

name: Burger
description: This is a simple burger logger app that demonstrate the use of MVC design pattern.
